We'll use the {stringr} package to extract and combine character strings.

## Learning objectives

* Learn the basics of working with strings
* Combine strings with output


## Pre-meeting

To prepare for this class meeting, please do the following:

* Read [R4DS2 14](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/strings.html){target='_blank'}

## Class meeting

* Useful character vectors
* Quotes and escaping
* String length
* Combine two or more strings
* Extracting strings
* Changing case
* Combining strings with output
* [Slides](../../slides/20_strings.qmd){target="_blank"} and [Code](../../code/20_strings.html){target="_blank"}
